firealert.subject: Fire Alert!
firealert.template:
Fire has been detected in these locations: 
{multi_location}
firealert.multi_location: Fire has been detected at location https://www.google.com/maps/dir/{longitude},{latitude} at time {time}

moisturealert.subject: Soil Moisture Alert!
moisturealert.template:
Moisture in these locations has exeded your settings: 
{multi_location}
moisturealert.multi_location: {alert_type} with treshhold {alert_value} has been detected at this location https://www.google.com/maps/dir/{longitude},{latitude} at {time} it was mesured to be {moisture_NPD}
